greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = -1 if (n+1)-st decimal digit of 1/Pi is smaller than n-th digit of 1/Pi, 0 if they are equal, 1 if larger.
mathematica: b = RealDigits[N[1/Pi, 1000]]; b = First[b]; a = {}; Do[k = b[[n + 1]] - b[[n]]; If[k < 0, AppendTo[a, -1], If[k == 0, AppendTo[a, 0], AppendTo[a, 1]]], {n, 1, 999}]; a (*Artur Jasinski*)
results.author: _Artur Jasinski_, Mar 16 2008
